title: Setting up time in UTC
body:
It would be nice to have a TimeUTC object that would always represent time in UTC.

For example, one could call TimeUTC.Now() instead of Time.Now.UTC().

Many packages may want to explicitly specify all times to be in UTC so as to circumvent location headaches and confusion. A TimeUTC object makes this specification much more transparent.

Trying to change the location/timezone on a TimeUTC object would be possible, but it would return a Time object instead of a TimeUTC object.
